dcterms:creator: Shuhei Tsuchida
Satoru Fukayama

Masataka Goto
dcterms:description: The AIST dance video database provides 1,389 human dance videos from 60 music pieces of 10 genres, filmed from multiple camera views.
dcterms:title: AIST dance video database

dcterms:creator: Ruilong Li
Shan Yang
David A Ross
Angjoo Kanazawa
dcterms:description: The AIST++ dance motion dataset extracts 3D human keypoint annotations and camera parameters from the AIST dance video database, providing 3D human dance motion visualizable with SMPL mesh models.
dcterms:title: AIST++ dance motion dataset
